headline: What Henry Schein (HSIC)'s Activist-Backed Governance Shift and CEO Transition Means For Shareholders
summary: In late January 2026, Greenlight Capital disclosed a new position in Henry Schein, highlighting margin improvement and free cash flow potential tied to activist board members, cost efficiencies, enhanced e-commerce capabilities, and a pending CEO transition following recent mid-single-digit global sales growth. An interesting dimension is how governance changes and operational upgrades at Henry Schein could reshape market perceptions of the company’s long-term earnings power and capital...

headline: Greenlight Capital Backs Henry Schein As Governance Shifts Target Margins
summary: Greenlight Capital has taken a new position in Henry Schein (NasdaqGS:HSIC). The investment thesis focuses on potential margin improvement and stronger free cash flow. Greenlight highlights operational changes tied to new activist board members. A pending CEO transition is expected to influence cost structure and e commerce priorities. Henry Schein, a major distributor of dental and medical products, sits at the intersection of healthcare services and digitizing supply chains. Investors...
